content: these little ghosts want to help you decorate for halloween written for a difficulty level of advanced beginner to intermediate 25 row using #10 thread with a #7 hook it will measure 13-14 inches across no picots graph added may 15 2021 created by masako kawahara thank you masako stitch counts corrected sept 2 2018 - r12 126 dcs 6 chain-3 spaces r14 162 dcs 6 chain-2 spaces r15 162 dcs 6 chain-2 spaces
